alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 20 at 1:05PM MST until December 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Central and Southern Laramie Range, adjacent foothills, and lower elevations of Platte County. This includes Interstate 25 from Cheyenne to Glendo. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winter Weather Advisory is also in effect Wednesday for brief periods of heavy snowfall and limited visibility.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills
